Text: Well, I dont need the brilliant Jewish expertise of Mr. Bernstein to know that one of the best investments is GOLD, as long as you dont have to touch that money and can wait for the long term, it beats many others and is as safe as it can be, besides you being able to pass the yellow coins from one hand to the other with your eyes shining with good old GREED as you hear the golden tinkling of the lot...  Thats why gold has made people go crazy over the centuries...
